sentences.en: A third inconsistency has to do with the number of dwarf galaxies.
sentences.cn: 第三项矛盾与矮星系的数目有关.

sentences.en: But this worlds be inconsistency, have heaven cannot but have hell.
sentences.cn: 但这个世界是矛盾的, 有天堂就有地狱.

sentences.en: Forearm and wrist movement is usually the biggest cause of inconsistency.
sentences.cn: 前臂和手腕运动通常是最大的不一致性的原因.

sentences.en: Gino is not ashamed of his inconsistency.
sentences.cn: 吉诺并不为自己的这种表里不一而感到羞愧.

sentences.en: His worst fault was his inconsistency.
sentences.cn: 他最大的缺点就是反复无常。

sentences.en: Inconsistency in UML models can be hard to trace manually.
sentences.cn: uml模型的不一致性很难人工跟踪.

sentences.en: Incorporate the dynamic inconsistency, reputation model into consideration scope.
sentences.cn: 将动态不一致性问题 以及 声誉模型等纳入考虑范围.

sentences.en: Many stat changes fixing inconsistency errors and some balancing problems.
sentences.cn: 修正一些平衡性及导致错误产生的问题.

sentences.en: The amendment will remove the inconsistency between the two laws.
sentences.cn: 修正案将会消除这两条法律之间的不一致之处.

sentences.en: The local security authority database contains an internal inconsistency.
sentences.cn: 本地安全颁发机构数据库内部包含不一致性.

sentences.en: The report accuses the judicial system of inconsistency and partiality.
sentences.cn: 报告指责司法系统执法前后不一且有失公正。

sentences.en: There was a great inconsistency between what he said and what he did.
There were several glaring inconsistencies (= very noticeable differences ) in his report.
sentences.cn: 他的报告中有几个明显的前后矛盾之处。

sentences.en: They have noticed his inconsistency on abortion.
sentences.cn: 他们已经注意到他在堕胎问题上态度反复无常.

sentences.en: This is an argument shot through with inconsistency.
sentences.cn: 这个论点前后矛盾，漏洞百出。

sentences.en: We are vexed by too much inconsistency and vacillation in our creed.
sentences.cn: 我们为了信条中有太多不一致和动摇的地方而感到苦恼.

phrases.tran_cn: 时间不一致性，时间矛盾

trans.tran_cn: 不一致，不协调，前后矛盾，不一贯
trans.tran_en: a situation in which two statements are different and cannot both be true
